title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Position Overview: We are seeking an experienced Senior Engineer Contractor with experience developing Windows applications and agents. The ideal candidate should have a background in the .NET Framework, API development, and possess hands-on experience in proxy servers. Key Responsibilities: • Design, develop, and maintain Windows applications and agents. • Design and implement proxy servers to facilitate network communication and data exchange. • Create robust, secure, and efficient software solutions within the .NET Framework. • Develop and maintain APIs, ensuring seamless integration with other systems and services. • Collaborate with project teams to understand requirements and deliver tailored technical solutions. • Produce comprehensive technical documentation to support development efforts and ensure maintainability. Qualifications: • Bachelor's in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. • Strong experience in software development, focusing on Windows applications. • Proficiency in .NET Framework, C#, and relevant programming languages. • Demonstrated experience in creating proxy servers. • Solid understanding of API development and management. • Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and contribute to project success. • Proven track record of delivering high-quality, reliable software solutions. Desired Skills: • Experience with cloud services (e.g., Azure, AWS) and familiarity with containerization technologies. • Knowledge of continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes and tools. • Familiarity with cybersecurity principles and best practices. • Database design and development experience. Contractor Benefits: • Competitive hourly or project-based pay. • Flexible working arrangements. • Opportunity to work on forward-thinking and innovative projects.
